userExperience.mainContentHeader: Your Mac Operating System is out of date.
userExperience.mainContentText:
To stay secure and keep testing tools working, you must upgrade macOS.

This upgrade takes about 30â€“60 minutes and requires a restart. Please save your work before continuing.
userExperience.secondaryContentText: Your Mac is more than one major macOS version behind the current standard. Updating ensures compatibility with Bluebook and Respondus LockDown Browser.
userExperience.approachingContentText: Please upgrade within the next 3 days.
userExperience.imminentContentText: You are within 24 hours of the deadline.
userExperience.elapsedContentText: Your Mac is past the required upgrade date. Upgrade now to avoid loss of access.
